pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to the 'open311' Standard // Access and handle APIs that use the international 'open311' 'GeoReport v2' standard for civic issue tracking https://wiki.open311.org/GeoReport_v2/. Retrieve civic service types and request data. Select and add available 'open311' endpoints and jurisdictions. Implicitly supports custom queries and 'open311' extensions. Requires a minimal number of hard dependencies while still allowing the integration in common R formats ('xml2', 'tibble', 'sf').
